entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
